New publication: Biological functions of therapy-induced senescence in cancer

01 June 2022

“Biological functions of therapy-induced senescence in cancer.” by Fitsiou E, Soto-Gamez A, Demaria M has been just published in Semin Cancer Biol. Congratulations to the authors!

PubMed ID: 33775830

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33775830/
